Class TasksViewModel

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.application.viewmodel.TasksViewModel
public final class TasksViewModel extends Object
ViewModel (MVVM) for the Tasks screen.

Responsibilities:

  • Mediates between Swing UI and the DAO-backed model.
  • Exposes UI-friendly read snapshots (no domain leakage).
  • Provides imperative commands for CRUD and state changes (Command + Undo/Redo).
  • Exports invalid input: '&' reports via Visitor + Records invalid input: '&' Pattern Matching.
  • Notifies UI (Observer) when rows change.

Notes:

  • UI must not touch ITask / Task directly.
  • After each mutation/undo/redo, the ViewModel reloads and fires properties.

  • Method Details

    • rowsProperty

      public Property<List<TasksViewModel.RowDTO>> rowsProperty()
      Property that emits unfiltered rows whenever data changes.

      public Property<List<TasksViewModel.RowDTO>> filteredRowsProperty()
      Property that emits filtered rows whenever data or filter changes.

    • canUndoProperty

      public Property<Boolean> canUndoProperty()
      Emits true/false when undo availability changes.

    • canRedoProperty

      public Property<Boolean> canRedoProperty()
      Emits true/false when redo availability changes.

    • setSortStrategy

      public void setSortStrategy(SortStrategy strategy)
      Sets the active sorting strategy (null clears). Fires properties.

    • clearSortStrategy

      public void clearSortStrategy()
      Clears sorting and reverts to DAO order. Fires properties.

    • reload

      public void reload() throws TasksDAOException
      Reloads tasks from the DAO into an internal snapshot and updates observable properties.
      Throws:
      TasksDAOException - if the DAO read fails

    • getRows

      public List<TasksViewModel.RowDTO> getRows()
      Returns a UI-friendly immutable snapshot.

      Call reload() beforehand if you need fresh data.

      Returns:
      immutable list of TasksViewModel.RowDTO

    • findRowById

      public Optional<TasksViewModel.RowDTO> findRowById(int id)
      Returns a single row by id for edit dialogs (no domain leakage).

    • getAvailableStates

      public TaskState[] getAvailableStates()
      Returns available states for UI combo-box binding.

    • setFilter

      public void setFilter(ITaskFilter filter)
      Sets the active Combinator filter (already composed with AND/OR on the caller side) and updates the filtered property immediately.
      Parameters:
      filter - non-null ITaskFilter
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if filter is null

    • clearFilter

      public void clearFilter()
      Clears any active filter and updates the filtered property to mirror unfiltered rows.

    • getFilteredRows

      public List<TasksViewModel.RowDTO> getFilteredRows()
      Returns a UI-friendly snapshot filtered with the active Combinator filter (if any).

      Call reload() beforehand if you need fresh data.

      Returns:
      immutable list of TasksViewModel.RowDTO after filter; or all rows if no filter set.

    • addTask

      public void addTask(String title, String description, TaskState state) throws CommandException
      Adds a new task via AddTaskCommand. DAO assigns the real id.
      Parameters:
      title - non-empty title
      description - nullable description
      state - non-null state
      Throws:
      CommandException - if validation/DAO fails

    • updateTask

      public void updateTask(int id, String title, String description, TaskState state) throws CommandException
      Updates an existing task via UpdateTaskCommand.
      Parameters:
      id - existing task id
      title - non-empty title
      description - nullable description
      state - non-null state
      Throws:
      CommandException - if task not found or validation/DAO fails

    • deleteTask

      public void deleteTask(int id) throws CommandException
      Deletes a task via DeleteTaskCommand.
      Parameters:
      id - existing task id
      Throws:
      CommandException - if task not found or DAO fails

    • deleteTasks

      public void deleteTasks(Collection<Integer> ids) throws CommandException
      Deletes multiple tasks via individual DeleteTaskCommand executions, skipping IDs that do not exist in the DAO, and refreshing once.
      Throws:
      CommandException

    • deleteTasks

      public void deleteTasks(int... ids) throws CommandException
      Varargs convenience for UI selections.
      Throws:
      CommandException

    • deleteAll

      public void deleteAll() throws TasksDAOException
      Deletes all tasks via DAO and refreshes observable state.
      Throws:
      TasksDAOException - if the DAO operation fails

    • markState

      public void markState(int id, TaskState state) throws CommandException
      Marks task state (explicit target) via MarkStateCommand.
      Parameters:
      id - existing task id
      state - non-null target state
      Throws:
      CommandException - if task not found, illegal transition, or DAO fails

    • transitionState

      public void transitionState(int id, TaskState target) throws CommandException
      State-pattern API: transition to a target state if allowed by current state's rules. Executes via MarkStateCommand to support undo/redo.
      Parameters:
      id - existing task id
      target - desired target state (non-null)
      Throws:
      CommandException - if task not found or transition is not allowed or DAO fails

    • advanceState

      public void advanceState(int id) throws CommandException
      Advances task to the next legal state according to current state's behavior. Executes via MarkStateCommand to support undo/redo.
      Parameters:
      id - existing task id
      Throws:
      CommandException - if task not found or DAO fails

    • canUndo

      public boolean canUndo()
      Returns:
      true if at least one command can be undone.

    • canRedo

      public boolean canRedo()
      Returns:
      true if at least one command can be redone.

    • undo

      public void undo() throws CommandException
      Undoes the last executed command and refreshes observable properties.
      Throws:
      CommandException - if undo fails

    • redo

      public void redo() throws CommandException
      Redoes the last undone command and refreshes observable properties.
      Throws:
      CommandException - if redo fails

    • getCountsByState

      public ByStateCount getCountsByState(boolean useFiltered)
      Returns a ByStateCount report directly for UI consumption (no file IO). If useFiltered is true, applies the current active filter over the in-memory snapshot.
      Parameters:
      useFiltered - whether to count only the filtered subset
      Returns:
      immutable ByStateCount value object

    • getCountsMapByState

      public EnumMap<TaskState, Integer> getCountsMapByState(boolean useFiltered)
      Convenience: returns counts as a map for UI widgets that bind to key/value.
      Parameters:
      useFiltered - whether to count only the filtered subset
      Returns:
      EnumMap with counts per TaskState

    • exportTasks

      public void exportTasks(Path path, ExportFormat format, boolean useFiltered) throws IOException, TasksDAOException
      Exports tasks (CSV/TXT) via Visitor (records invalid input: '&' pattern matching). Prefer the overload with filteredIds to export the table subset.
      Parameters:
      path - output file path
      format - CSV or TXT (see ExportFormat)
      useFiltered - true to export a subset (see overload)
      Throws:
      IOException - if writing fails
      TasksDAOException - if DAO access fails

    • exportTasks

      public void exportTasks(Path path, ExportFormat format, boolean useFiltered, List<Integer> filteredIds) throws IOException, TasksDAOException
      Exports tasks (CSV/TXT) via Visitor (records invalid input: '&' pattern matching). When useFiltered is true and filteredIds provided, only those IDs are exported. Otherwise, all tasks are exported.
      Parameters:
      path - output file path
      format - CSV or TXT
      useFiltered - whether to export a filtered subset
      filteredIds - optional list of task IDs
      Throws:
      IOException - if writing fails
      TasksDAOException - if DAO access fails

    • exportByStateReport

      public void exportByStateReport(Path path, ExportFormat format, boolean useFiltered, List<Integer> filteredIds) throws IOException, TasksDAOException
      Exports a “count by state” report via Visitor + exporters.
      Parameters:
      path - output file path
      format - CSV or TXT
      useFiltered - whether to export a filtered subset
      filteredIds - optional list of task IDs
      Throws:
      IOException - if writing fails
      TasksDAOException - if DAO access fails
